name: el Volcan
description:
Navigate your way across an island paradise, through lava filled caves into the depths of  el Volcan!         Everything will kill you!

         The object of the game is to reach the end of the 4th level without dying.  If you do, you will be rewarded. This game is meant to be hard the first time, encouraging the player to perfect the run.

 This project was all about teaching myself how to build a game and learning to use various game making tools. All of the custom art, sounds, music and assets have been created primarily in Gamemaker studio and also using photoshop cs6, LMMS, Bfxr and Audacity.  

el Volcon is currently  available as a windows download with keyboard controls 

Please leave any comments or feedback!
